definition: to grip forcefully/to clutch at/to guard/to control/to hold
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

sentences.english: That situation, in a nutshell, describes the world of designing for debugging.
sentences.chinese: 这种情况，简单扼要地描述了调试设计界的情况。

sentences.english: The distribution of mineral resources and the main production corporation of silver in the world are briefly introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文扼要地介绍了银的资源状况及主要生产厂家。

sentences.english: Briefing of initial experimental study on optical carriers is also given.
sentences.chinese: 扼要介绍关于光频载波的初步的实验研究工作。

sentences.english: Give me a brief summary of the contents.
sentences.chinese: 请把内容简单扼要地讲一讲。

sentences.english: The structural system and foundation of Skirt Building are outlined as well.
sentences.chinese: 裙房的结构体系及基础也作了扼要的介绍。

sentences.english: Finally, a simple and compendious summary is presented.
sentences.chinese: 最后对此次设计进行了简明，扼要的总结。

sentences.english: Please give me a summary of product specs.
sentences.chinese: 请为我扼要说明产品的规格。

sentences.english: Also the application of FSR rapid switch is presented.
sentences.chinese: 扼要介绍了FSR快速开关的实际应用。

sentences.english: He characterized briefly the main trend in the world today.
sentences.chinese: 他简单扼要地描述了当前世界的主要倾向。

sentences.english: This article briefly introduces construction dewatering in the san filled area for the Mawan Electric Power Plant project.
sentences.chinese: 本文对深圳妈湾电厂填砂区的施工降水作扼要介绍。

sentences.english: Chapter three offers a brief introduction to Freud and his Tripartite Model of the Mind.
sentences.chinese: 第三章扼要介绍了弗洛依德和他的人格三部论。

sentences.english: The news reports of journalists of radio and TV station need to be concise.
sentences.chinese: 电台和电视台的记者的新闻报道必须简明扼要。

sentences.english: In this paper, porntly expound the principle and application of laser-generated ultrasound technique.
sentences.chinese: 本文扼要地阐述了激光超声技术的基本原理及其应用。

sentences.english: He recapitulated the main points of the speech.
sentences.chinese: 他把讲话的重点扼要重述了一遍。

sentences.english: It was tersely worded, but a significant breakthrough.
sentences.chinese: 话说得扼要但有突破性的意义。

sentences.english: The last chapter namely chapter 7 is the summary of the article.
sentences.chinese: 最后一章即第7章是全文的扼要总结。

definition: thorough and detailed/exhaustive/the tedious details in full
to concentrate on the main points (idiom); to bring out the essentials
to analyze thoroughly, point by point (idiom)
variant of 簡練|简练[jian3 lian4]
